Name: Jumia
Description: Jumia is one of the largest online marketplaces in Africa, offering a variety of products including electronics, fashion, and groceries.

Name: Kilimall
Description: Kilimall is a popular Kenyan e-commerce site, offering electronics, fashion, beauty, and home appliances.

Name: Masoko
Description: Masoko is an online marketplace owned by Safaricom, offering products ranging from electronics, fashion, to groceries.

Name: OLX Kenya
Description: OLX is a classifieds platform that allows users to buy and sell a wide range of products such as electronics, vehicles, and furniture.

Name: MyDawa
Description: MyDawa is Kenya's leading online pharmacy, providing healthcare products, prescription medicine, and wellness products.

Name: Carrefour Kenya
Description: Carrefour is a multinational supermarket chain that also offers online shopping for groceries, electronics, and more.

Name: Shopify
Description: Shopify is a global e-commerce platform that allows businesses to create online stores to sell products worldwide.

Name: Amazon
Description: Amazon is one of the largest global online retailers, offering a vast selection of products across many categories.

Name: eBay
Description: eBay is a multinational e-commerce corporation that facilitates consumer-to-consumer and business-to-consumer sales through its website.

Name: AliExpress
Description: AliExpress is a Chinese e-commerce platform that connects international buyers with Chinese sellers, offering a variety of products.

Name: Daraz
Description: Daraz is an online shopping platform in South Asia that offers products across various categories like electronics, fashion, and home goods.

Name: Tokopedia
Description: Tokopedia is an Indonesian e-commerce platform, which allows users to buy and sell a wide range of products from local businesses.

Name: Lazada
Description: Lazada is a Southeast Asian online shopping platform offering products across categories like electronics, fashion, and home goods.

Name: Flipkart
Description: Flipkart is an Indian e-commerce company, offering a range of products including electronics, fashion, and lifestyle goods.

Name: Mercado Libre
Description: Mercado Libre is the largest e-commerce platform in Latin America, providing a marketplace for products like electronics, fashion, and home goods.

Name: Shopee
Description: Shopee is an e-commerce platform operating in Southeast Asia and Taiwan, offering a wide variety of products from sellers across the region.

Name: Etsy
Description: Etsy is a global marketplace focused on handmade, vintage, and unique products, allowing artists and makers to sell their creations.

Name: Alibaba
Description: Alibaba is a Chinese multinational conglomerate that provides a platform for global wholesale trade and e-commerce solutions.

Name: Best Buy
Description: Best Buy is a multinational electronics retailer with a strong online presence, selling electronics, appliances, and tech accessories.

Name: Walmart
Description: Walmart is a multinational retail corporation with an extensive e-commerce platform, offering products from groceries to electronics.

Name: Lulu Hypermarket
Description: Lulu Hypermarket is a retail chain in the Middle East, offering groceries, electronics, fashion, and more.
